content: the bonnie bell bonnet makes an adorable photography prop or accessory to any outfit pair with the bonnie bell legwarmers for the perfect set pattern difficulty easy bonnet is made using single_crochet double_crochet and cdc cross double_crochet there is step by step instructions on how to do the cdc stitch in the pattern as well as a link to a video tutorial sizes available newborn 12-13 head circumference 0-3m 13-14 head circumference 3-6m 14-16 head circumference 6-12m 16-18 head circumference gauge is determined by measuring the circumference at the last round of increases any heavy worsted weight yarn will work for this project as long as gauge is met all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 ** you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
